name: h3
description: Introducing the 2026 Soldier Tank Drip Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat, the pinnacle of innovation in the softball world. Engineered with proprietary Trampoline Quad-Wall Technology and accelerated spacers, this bat is said to have a "pop so ridiculous, it's like a trampoline" on the field. Years of meticulous research in composite material technology have culminated in an incredibly light swing weight and an enlarged ultra-hot sweet spot, making it the top choice for power and contact hitters alike. Developed by elite engineers both in the lab and on the field, this speed bat is built for power, featuring a new carbon fiber speed end cap and infused power technology. With its soft comfort tack grip and full taper handle for enhanced control, the Soldier Tank Drip Drop 11 is the official metal bat of Perfect Game and the definitive bat for every hitter in 2026. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
category_path: 2026 Soldier Tank Drip Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat: ST-S-26-2-11
